column4: Shall I beg? I can't find further information on this damn phppgadmin, according to the readme apt-get install should have sufficed...
no need to beg, but if people here could help, they would have done so
can you try for an IRC channel more specific to that software?

of course but the problem is surely specific to the ubuntu package - it's very easy to install the package in general from source, but I don't know anything about apache configuration, nor I know how ubuntu does the "automatic" configuration after installation
